name: DDOS-d
description:
Hey this ddos-d. A game base in future where robots and AI have taken over the world. You have the power to see through machine circuits and can disable the the machines by adjusting according to logic circuit. The game is based on the logic-gates ( currently only has and or gates ). This was made for olc-codejam-2021.

Also if you think that game totally sucks well that's fine. I could have done better If I had not procrastinated. 

Also post your time taken to complete the game below. Feedback is always appreciated. And if you want to see the code here is the code at github.
